## BaleKit
A tool for developing bots in Bale messenger!
## Quick Example
```python
from balekit import Bot
app = Bot("TOKEN")
me = app.get_me()
print(me)
app.send_message(1234567890, "Hello World!")
```

- [Telegram](https://t.me/mpm_ms)

## Installing

```bash
pip install balekit
```
